text: Wow, the sizzling sound is so tempting!
Hi everyone, I'm back.
Today we will make another delicious dish together to improve family daily menu
And we will make a gorgeous grilled chicken dish,
which can be served with rice in daily family meals
or as a snack for the kids.  Very delicious!
Ingredients for this dish include:
500 gr chicken breast or chicken thighs
1 tbsp minced garlic
2 tsp coriander seeds
1/2 tsp pepper
1 tbsp sugar
1 tbsp annatto oil
2 tbsp oyster oil
2 tbsp soy sauce
I will remove the skin and bones from the chicken.
Then rinse well and drain.
After that cut the meat into long pieces to the thickness of 0.5 - 1cm
Next, in a mortar and pestle, combine the garlic, pepper, and coriander seeds. Grind finely
Add 1 tbsp sugar, 1 tbsp annatto oil, 2 tbsp oyster sauce, 2 tbsp soy sauce and mix well.
Combine the marinade with the chicken and mix well.
Leave to marinate in the fridge for about 30 minutes.
I will put on gloves and use my hands to handle the chicken.
Itâ€™s easier to skew and coat the chicken with the marinade.
You can use bamboo skewers or metal ones like these.
Every time I cook, I put in a lot of effort,
especially in the marinating part, which takes quite some time.
Especially in the hot summer,
the work will be harder as it is easier to sweat.
Many viewers told me that when preparing food,
our hands sometimes get hurt as the hands are soaked in water for a long time.
Using gloves also causes sweat.
It's always hot and humid, so it's easy to get fungal infections.
When finish skewing, place the chicken on the grilling pan
or cook in an air fryer.
Wow, the sizzling sound is so tempting!
When the chicken is cooked, I will turn it over
and brush another layer of the marinade
to make it look more shinny and eye-catching.
Talking about dry hands, at first, I didn't pay attention,
but just unconsciously scratched my hands because it was itchy and uncomfortable.
At that time, my husband joked that
it was probably because I didn't wash my hands properly
But it wasn't until my skin started to dry out and peel off
that I realized that I didn't pay attention to taking care of my hands.
You need to pay attention to the manifestations on the skin of your hands,
for example, when you feel itchy on your hands, and observe the appearance of nappy rash
it could be a sign of fungal nappy/sweat rash.
If you have a fungal infection on your hands,
you will have a very uncomfortable itchy feeling,
making it difficult to focus on what to do, leading to forgetfulness and easy failure.
However, do not worry
because fungal skin infection is also quite common for those who work as housewives
or are often exposed to that hot and humid environment.
What you could do is to moisturize often and take care of the skin around the nails,
take more vitamins
or simply have a tube of anti-fungal cream available.
That way even if you have fungal infections on your hands, it's ready to use right away,
instead of suffering from prolonged itching.
Here is our final product.
When the chicken skewers are grilled,
they will have a beautiful golden-brown color.
The inside is very succulent, let me give it a try.
Wow, the meat still retains its softness and sweetness.
Spices like garlic, cilantro, and pepper
are very fragrant and delicious.
This dish can be served with chili sauce and salad to increase the freshness.
Hopefully, with this video,
you will have more ideas to cook delicious food for your family to enjoy.
Good bye and see you again.
